summary: September 1998: A recent spate of unusual suicide incidents where several high school girls fell to their death, but left no suicide note and had apparently no reason to commit suicide. In ... See full summary »
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Kenichi Suzumura|Takako Honda|Ayumi Fujimura|Rie Tanaka|Eri Nakao|Shuuzou Nakamura
title: Gekijô ban Kara no kyôkai: Dai isshô - Fukan fûkei
